channel.title: Joseph: 7 Lessons in Diplomacy: Classic Sinai Podcast
channel.itunes:description: Jewish audio mp3s for the curious mind.
channel.itunes:author: Dr David Luchins
channel.description: Dr David Luchins, former senatorial advisor, takes a closer look at Joseph and draws out 7 lessons of diplomacy we can all use - even if we never becomes foreign ambassadors.
